content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.usb_apps_device_cdc_serial_emulator_sam_e70_xult
content.displayName: CDC Serial Emulator Example (cdc_serial_emulator) Example for SAM E70/S70/V70/V71 Family
content.shortDescription: This application demonstrates the use of the CDC device class to implement a USB-to-Serial Converter. TThe application enumerates a COM port on the personal computer. Data received through the CDC USB interface is forwarded to a UART. Data received on the UART is forwarded to the CDC USB interface on the target board. The interface between the UART and the CDC USB Interface on the board demonstrates the USB to UART capability.
content.author: Microchip
